---
title: https://developer.android.com/build/troubleshoot
url: https://developer.android.com/build/troubleshoot
source: md.txt
---

If you encounter issues with the Android Gradle plugin, try the following
actions:

- Check whether your issue is listed in the [Android Studio troubleshooting guide](https://developer.android.com/studio/troubleshoot) or the [known issues](https://developer.android.com/studio/known-issues). Those pages list known issues and workarounds.
- If your issue persists, [file a bug](https://developer.android.com/studio/report-bugs).
